text: Mumu () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Anatoliy Bobrovskiy and Evgeniy Teterin.Ход котомМУМУ (1959) It stars Afanasi Kochetkov, Nina Grebeshkova, and Yelena Polevitskaya. == Actors == * Afanasi Kochetkov as Gerasim * Nina Grebeshkova as Tatyana * Yelena Polevitskaya as The Mistress * Igor Bezyayev as Kapiton * Ivan Ryzhov as Gavrila * Evgeniy Teterin as Khariton * Leonid Kmit as Stepan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Anatoliy Bobrovsky
title: Mumu (1959 movie)
